channel.title: Golang on Draw Closer - A Blog by Sharon Wu
channel.description: Recent content in Golang on Draw Closer - A Blog by Sharon Wu

item.title: Install Golang and Set Go Workplace
item.description:
Go or called GoLang is an open source programming language that makes it easy to build simple, reliable, and efficient software.

In this post, we'll talk about how to install Golang and set its workplace. Also, sub directories under the workplace are introduced.
